alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Catoosa; Chattooga; Dade; Floyd; Gordon; Haralson; Murray; Polk; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 31 at 4:16AM EDT until October 31 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHWEST GEORGIA... * Affected Area...Far northwest Georgia. * Timing...Late Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * Winds...Northwest at 10 to 15 mph with gusts to 20 to 25 mph. * Relative Humidity...Minimum relative humidity values between 20 and 30 percent * Impacts...Due to low humidity and gusty winds in addition, very dry fuels and ongoing drought conditions, any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that there is high potential for the development of critical fire weather conditions. A Fire Danger Statement is in effect for portions of the watch area through this evening. However, if conditions warrant, an upgrade to a Red Flag Warning is possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings. Please refer to the local burn permitting authorities on whether you may burn outdoors. If you do burn outside...use extreme caution. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of the Fire Weather Watch.
